basic.description: Analysis of variance for fixed, random and mixed models; analysis of covariance; distribution of mean squares; classical designs including fractional factorial experiments, Latin squares and split plot designs. Modern topics including Taguchi methods and designs for nonlinear models. (Offered jointly with STAT-471*.)  Three term hours, fall or winter; lectures.
basic.subject: STAT
basic.title: Design & Analysis Of Experim.
